title: About Us
text:
Dr. Abraham Ayebo is an Associate Professor in the Center for Learning Innovation at the University of Minnesota Rochester.
Dr. Samantha Seals is an Associate Professor of Statistics in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics at the University of West Florida. Dr. Seals’ teaches upper-division and graduate statistics, biostatistics, and data science courses.
Dr. Toni Sorrell is an Associate Professor of Math Education in the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science Department at Longwood University.
This work is the result of the authors’ participation in the BATS program, which is supported by NSF IUSE: EHR program with award numbers 2215879, 2215920, and 2215709.
